EmailTemplate.name: Onboarding Physician Approval Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Onboarding Physician Approval Mail
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi sir, Your account has been created successfully. Kindly do the following steps in your Google calendar to make your calendar events available to our receptionist for the Appointment booking process.
Steps :
1. Go to your Google calendar which is linked with this Gmail account 2. In the right side panel My calendar section will be there, when you hover your name 3 dots will be available. Click that dots 3. Select Settings and Sharing 4. In Share with specific people section click Add people Button, pop-up will trigger 5. Copy and paste this Email Id - emperorprashanth@gmail.com 6. Below that In permission dropdown Select Make changes to events 7. click send
Note : After this Process, Receptionist can view and edit your calendar events.
